system.description:
The School of magic concerned with enhancing and aiding your allies. The elves call this School 'The School of Spell Songs', and almost exclusively use song as their Casting Form for this School. Another common Form for this School is prayer.

Spontaneous Casting Complexities

ComplexityEffect
0

Help an Ability roll; improve a sense

1

Increase a Pool by half the margin; reduce Injury penalties by the margin

2

Use half the margin to help all Ability rolls

3

Add half the margin as extra damage

4

Add half the margin as extra actions

5

Improve a sense to supernatural levels
